author: ezw9500
content: hello, is zhejiang the last step before shanghai goes live?

author: ezw9500
content: any roadmap/checklist for the shanghai upgrade?

author: abcoathup
content:
I assume that existing public testnets Goerli and Sepolia will be upgraded after Zhejiang testnet and before mainnet. The timeline will depend on what issues are found. 

We might hear more at the All Core Devs - Execution call this week.

content: thank you! will check the call notes after
